content:
Western Sahara is not well-developed for tourism, and the availability of accommodations in the region can be limited. However, there are some decent hotels in towns like Laayoune, Dakhla, and Boujdour. Some of the most recommended hotels in Western Sahara are:

1. Hotel Parador: A four-star hotel located in Laayoune. It offers comfortable accommodations with an outdoor pool, spa services, and a restaurant serving international cuisine.

2. Hotel Sahara: A three-star hotel located in the heart of Dakhla. It offers guests comfortable and well-maintained rooms, as well as a rooftop terrace and a restaurant serving local and international cuisine.

3. Hotel Andalucía: A three-star hotel located in Boujdour. It offers guests comfortable and well-equipped rooms, as well as a restaurant and café serving local dishes.

Please note that the hotel market in Western Sahara is limited and options may be limited during peak travel seasons. It is recommended to book accommodations in advance.
